task.name: VOC build-up
task.description:
Make sure the VOC (Video Operations Center) is up and operational, so the video setup can proceed. The VOC is the central control room for all video operations at FOSDEM. You'll help set up networking equipment, test video feeds, configure monitoring systems, and ensure all infrastructure is ready for the video team to deploy to individual rooms. Some technical knowledge is helpful but not required - training and guidance will be provided on-site.
Read more at https://doc.volunteers.fosdem.org/video/video/

task.name: VOC video team
task.description:
Monitor and debug issues with the video from the Video Operations Center (VOC). You'll be in the central control room overseeing all video streams across FOSDEM. This involves monitoring multiple video feeds, troubleshooting technical issues, coordinating with room-based and building-responsible video volunteers, and ensuring smooth streaming and recording of all talks. Technical skills are helpful. You should be comfortable with computers and quick problem-solving.
Read more at https://doc.volunteers.fosdem.org/video/video/
